coupon_turnover_tip: We're very sorry that the coupon couldn't be used successfully. It has been returned to your account and remains valid for use.
coupon_failed_tip: The order amount doesn't meet the requirement. The coupon has been returned to your account and remains valid for use
coupon_transaction_exceeds_tip: The face value of the card in a single transaction exceeds {{amount}}
coupon_not_use_tip: Coupons cannot be used in combination. Only one coupon can be used at a time. Coupons will become invalid if they are not used before the expiration date
transaction_coupon_tip: Your coupon has been returned to your account. Please check it
rank_empty_tip: You can unlock ranking rewards by reaching a higher level.
rank_leaderboard: Focus on strength and witness glory
rank_rules_invitation_accessContent: • Open to all users (Tiers 0-5) - no tier restrictions
rank_rules_invitation_rankContent: • Based on weekly invites (resets & rewards every Monday)
rank_rules_invitation_visibilityContent: • Unified leaderboard data visible to all
rank_rules_sales_updateTime: •  Updates hourly/daily; Settled on 1st (rewards based on last month's data)
rank_rules_sales_accessContent:
• Tier 0: No leaderboard.
• Tiers 1-5: Unlock same-tier competition.
rank_rules_sales_rankingContent: • Based on monthly transaction volume (reset every 1st)
rank_rules_sales_visibilityContent:
• See only your tier's transaction data.
• View all tier's reward amounts
level_meet_the_level_upgrade: Meet the level upgrade conditions, and the membership level will be immediately upgraded
level_rule_reward_description: Promotion rewards are claimable only upon first reaching a tier; Upgrade membership level and immediately distribute coupons
level_rules_type_example_description: Meet criteria in Month 3 of protection→New 6-month period begins immediately.
level_membership_updated_tip: Your membership tier has been updated to
level_rules_description_monthlyAutoPromo: Your tier is automatically updated on the 1st of each month based on previous month's transaction
level_rules_description_tierSkippingPriv: Transaction surge? Jump tiers directly with no step-by-step requirements! (0→5)
level_rules_description_demotionPolicy: Fail to meet tier criteria → Drop 1 tier the following month.
level_rules_description_safetyNet: Maximum 1-tier drop per month (even with consecutive failures).
level_rules_description_example: Skip from Tier 0 to 5 → Claim all Tier 1-5 Promotion rewards
level_rules_description: Promotion rewards are claimable only upon first reaching a tier; coupons for your current tier are automatically issued each month after tier updates.
level_rules_description_renewal: New protection period starts from the month of meeting criteria.
level_rules_description_expiry: Post-protection failure → Downgrade to Tier 4 next month.
level_maintain_level_description: Maintain the current level for half a year
level_rankings_update_tip: Rankings update hourly, rewards issued monthly on the 1st.
level_gift_card_trades: Gift card trades, Keep tier easily, savor perks
level_upgrade_card_trades: Trade gift cards for an upgrade
message_clear_message_tip_content: Are you sure you want to mark all unread messages as read?
message_delete_confirmation_content: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
